sgcool_label_text: This entertainment weekly was  published by the Singapore Broadcasting Corporation (now known as Mediacorp) in the 1980s and 1990s. It provided the local Chinese readers the local and regional entertainment news and television programme schedules.  The cover of each issue features  celebrities from the entertainment scene. This issue has Wang Yuqing and Chen Bifeng on the cover
creator_1: Singapore Broadcasting Corporation Singapore Broadcasting Corporation (TTE)
